extendedInfo.description: Quick wargame for wargamers simulating the Axis-Soviet conflict on the Eastern Front from 1941 to 1945.The Player moves the Axis forces against a simulated Soviet enemy. As time passes the Axis forces gradually weaken, while the Soviet counter-attacks gather pace.Each year is split into 3 turns. 3 difficulty options.

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: Nice little game. It\'s hard even at the easy level. However, would be great if the rules - in particular the return Soviet moves where spelled out a bit more.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple game with minimal strategy, bears very little resemblance to history
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a game that would definitely benefit from an online manual.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Had to refund/uninstall due to no rules and map was too small compared to screen. (Sprint Epic). Has potential.
reviews.author: A Google User
